summary: Simple facelift and name change for Jenassa.  Based off an old D&D Frost Mage character.
descriptionHtml:
I've always liked Jenassa, but never really cared for her looks. Most of the replacers I've found for her didn't appeal to me, so I set out to make my own. As I was going over some ideas in my head, my wife showed me a box of all our roleplaying stuff that had been back of the closet for over a decade. As I looked at the old and forgotten characters, it hit me: I'll recreate my wife's drow frost mage.

In addition to giving Jenassa a facelift, I changed her name to that of my wife's original character. She's still stealthy and shouldn't trigger pressure plate traps, but her entire combat has been reworked to make her more of caster than a melee/archer. She comes with a multitude of ice spells, made essential, and scales with the player's level. I had a lot of fun using her, even if I took a few accidental ice spikes in the rear end. If you like it, please endorse.

Requirements:
ApachiiSkyHair - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
The Eyes of Beauty - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722

Recommended: (to look like the screenshots)
CBBE female body replacer - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666
Better females by Bella - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2812 (no makeup version)

Installation:
Use NMM or simply drop the .esp and the .bsa files into the Data folder. It's that simple.

Uninstallation:
Use NMM or simply delete the .esp and the .bsa files from the Data folder. It's that simple.

Conflicts:
If you're using UFO (Ultimate Follower Overhaul - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14037), make sure this mod is loaded AFTER UFO, or you'll get the discolored vanilla head bug. It may just be doing this on my machine, but I don't have the slightest idea why it happens.

Thanks to the Nexus modding community, you guys make it possible to enjoy playing the same games over and over and over...

Special Thanks to FalmerBane. After using many of his beautifully done replacers, it inspired me to make some of my own.
author: DDey
